entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who went down with the next present they'd meant to give to Karkus.

entities.name: karkus
entities.description: Karkus is a giant, described as massive and wearing a helmet.

entities.name: olympia (olymppe)
entities.description: Olympia is a person who helped Hagrid get out of trouble by performing fast spellwork with her wand.

relationships.description: Hagrid and his group visited Karkus, but were met with hostility.
Olympia rescued Hagrid from the giants who had grabbed him.
